mapper.insert: insert into hive_deploy_detail ( deploy_detail_id, org_id, deploy_id, group_code, deploy_label, gmt_create, gmt_modify ) values ( #{deployDetailId}, #{orgId}, #{deployId}, #{groupCode}, #{deployLabel}, now(6), now(6) )
